recipe.name: Hershy's Favorite Hot Cocoa
recipe.notes: Getting the Challenge Cocoa Brownies brought me in contact with other box-side recipes, such as this one from Hershy's.  You'd think they'd know a thing or two about cocoa.Their website (http://www.hershykitchens.com) is some serious mojo, best visited after near-complete satiation.
recipe.preparation: In a saucepan, mix water, sugar, cocoa and salt.  Bring to a boil and stir at boil for two minutes.  Stir in milk and bring to heat but do not boil.Mix in vanilla and serve.
